channel.title: Easy Java Simulator, Anyone have experience in using this?
channel.description: I was just wondering if anyone actually knows how to use this tool because i need help learning it ASAP for an assignment that I need done. I can't get the GUI working on my source code.

item.title: Easy Java Simulator, Anyone have experience in using this?
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

He wants it done for him. AtomicInt_ was doing it but now he is not. Honestly he has no source code as he calls it atm. I suggest Stuart that you go and learn swing, learn buffers, pixel drawing, just graphics in general. (Specifically Learn About Applets)
